abstract: Paul Beatty wins Man Booker Prize for novel The Sellout, becoming first American writer to win award.

headline.print_headline: Man Booker Prize Goes to American for First Time
headline.main: Paul Beatty Wins Man Booker Prize With ‘The Sellout’

snippet: Mr. Beatty, the first American to capture the prestigious British award, wrote “The Sellout,” a scathing satire about race in America....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Beatty, the first American to capture the prestigious British award, wrote “The Sellout,” a scathing satire about race in America.
